snippet: The 22-year-old woman died Monday after a lion jumped into her vehicle through an open window at a wildlife park on the outskirts of Johannesburg.
abstract: American woman is killed by lion while in car at wildlife park outside Johannesburg.
lead_paragraph: The 22-year-old woman died Monday after a lion jumped into her vehicle through an open window at a wildlife park on the outskirts of Johannesburg.

headline.main: South Africa: American Woman Is Mauled to Death by a Lion
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: American Woman, 22, Is Mauled to Death by a Lion
